name: Fidelman-Danziger, Inc., Appellant, v. Statler Management, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Fidelman-Danziger, Inc. v. Statler Management, Inc.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Fidelman-Danziger, Inc., Appellant, v. Statler Management, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Court below is affirmed on the able and comprehensive opinion of Judge Montgomery, reported in 9 Pa. D. & C. 2d 677.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Bruce R. Martin, with him Pringle, Bredin d Martin, for appellant.
John M. Reed, with him G. Harold Blaxter and Blaxter, O’Neill d Houston, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Fidelman-Danziger, Inc., Appellant, v. Statler Management, Inc.
Argued October 9, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
November 11, 1957:
Bruce R. Martin, with him Pringle, Bredin d Martin, for appellant.
John M. Reed, with him G. Harold Blaxter and Blaxter, O’Neill d Houston, for appellees.
